fields.name: Stuff I like
fields.value:
•Knitting, fishing, picking up random things I find on the ground. 
•Hoarding: “What can I make out of this piece of trash?”
•Horror fiction and podcasts. Thomas Ligotti. 
•I’m old now so I get to wear a fedora if I want.

fields.name: Stuff I don’t like
fields.value:
•Fascism, bigotry, closed-mindedness, boundary violations. 
•Crazy Florida drivers. Crazy Florida pedestrians.
•Cornbread should never contain sugar.
